message: Operation 'pushTemplates' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects, poor_ai_interpretability. Summary is somewhat clear but could be more concise and action-oriented. Description is missing entirely, creating significant gaps in AI agent understanding. Added details about: (1) what the operation accomplishes (copies templates), (2) required inputs (TemplatesPushModel with server IDs), (3) response confirmation, (4) side effects (templates duplicated, originals unchanged), and (5) use case context (template reuse across servers). This provides AI agents with sufficient context to determine when this operation is appropriate.

data.current_summary: Push templates from one server to another
data.description_suggestion: Copies email templates from a source server to a destination server. Accepts a TemplatesPushModel containing source and destination server identifiers and template selection criteria. Returns a 200 response confirming the push operation completed successfully. Templates are duplicated to the destination server; originals remain unchanged on the source server. This operation enables template reuse across multiple servers within an account.
data.reasoning: Summary is somewhat clear but could be more concise and action-oriented. Description is missing entirely, creating significant gaps in AI agent understanding. Added details about: (1) what the operation accomplishes (copies templates), (2) required inputs (TemplatesPushModel with server IDs), (3) response confirmation, (4) side effects (templates duplicated, originals unchanged), and (5) use case context (template reuse across servers). This provides AI agents with sufficient context to determine when this operation is appropriate.

message: Operation 'createDomain' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Summary is clear but description is missing entirely. Added details about required/optional inputs from DomainCreationModel, the returned domain object structure, and the important side effect that domains start in an unverified state requiring DNS configuration.

data.description_suggestion: Creates a new domain for the account. Accepts a domain name and optional return path configuration. Returns the newly created domain object with initial DNS verification requirements and DKIM key generation. The domain will be in an unverified state until DNS records are confirmed.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear but description is missing entirely. Added details about required/optional inputs from DomainCreationModel, the returned domain object structure, and the important side effect that domains start in an unverified state requiring DNS configuration.

message: Operation 'deleteDomain' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_side_effects. Summary is clear but description is missing. Added critical context about the permanent nature of deletion, required parameters, and important side effects (removal of associated DNS records, DKIM keys, and sender signatures) to help AI agents understand the destructive impact.

data.description_suggestion: Permanently deletes a domain from the account. Requires the domain ID as a path parameter. This operation cannot be undone and will remove all associated DNS records, DKIM keys, and sender signatures linked to this domain.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear but description is missing. Added critical context about the permanent nature of deletion, required parameters, and important side effects (removal of associated DNS records, DKIM keys, and sender signatures) to help AI agents understand the destructive impact.

message: Operation 'requestDkimVerificationForDomain' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details. Summary is clear but description is missing. Added context about what verification entails (checking DNS configuration), the expected outcome (activation of pending DKIM values), and what is returned to help AI agents understand when and how to use this operation in the DKIM setup workflow.

data.description_suggestion: Requests verification of pending DKIM DNS records for a domain. Postmark will check if the DKIM DNS entries have been properly configured and confirmed. Upon successful verification, pending DKIM values will be activated and used for email signing. Returns the updated domain object with verification status.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear but description is missing. Added context about what verification entails (checking DNS configuration), the expected outcome (activation of pending DKIM values), and what is returned to help AI agents understand when and how to use this operation in the DKIM setup workflow.

message: Operation 'requestReturnPathVerificationForDomain' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Missing description entirely. Added context about what the operation does (initiates verification), what inputs are required (domain ID), what is returned (domain extended information with verification status), and clarified that it's an asynchronous verification process without modifying configuration. This helps AI agents understand the operation's purpose and effects.

data.description_suggestion: Initiates DNS verification for the Return-Path record of the specified domain. This operation triggers a verification request that checks if the Return-Path DNS record is properly configured. The domain ID must be provided as a path parameter. Returns the domain's extended information including the current Return-Path verification status. This operation does not modify the domain configuration but initiates an asynchronous verification process.
data.reasoning: Missing description entirely. Added context about what the operation does (initiates verification), what inputs are required (domain ID), what is returned (domain extended information with verification status), and clarified that it's an asynchronous verification process without modifying configuration. This helps AI agents understand the operation's purpose and effects.

message: Operation 'requestSPFVerificationForDomain' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Missing description entirely. Added context about what the operation does (initiates SPF verification), what inputs are required (domain ID), what is returned (domain extended information with SPF status), and clarified the asynchronous nature. Consistent with Return-Path verification operation for parallel understanding.

data.description_suggestion: Initiates DNS verification for the SPF (Sender Policy Framework) record of the specified domain. This operation triggers a verification request that checks if the SPF DNS record is properly configured for the domain. The domain ID must be provided as a path parameter. Returns the domain's extended information including the current SPF verification status and SPF record details. This operation does not modify the domain configuration but initiates an asynchronous verification process.
data.reasoning: Missing description entirely. Added context about what the operation does (initiates SPF verification), what inputs are required (domain ID), what is returned (domain extended information with SPF status), and clarified the asynchronous nature.
